item.title: Mind the Gap
item.description: “Mind the gap” is a warning that’s posted in the UK subway system. It is a notice for passengers to be mindful of the gap between the platform and the subway car so that they don’t trip or injure themselves in some way. I’d like to use the phrase to remind us of another gap we should be mindful of. While it could certainly result in bodily harm to forget about that gap in the UK subway, ignoring this gap could do even greater damage.
